name: ScamBaiter
0:
”Alexa open Scam Baiter”
”Alexa ask Scam Baiter for a scam type”
”Alexa tell Scam Baiter to tell me how to prevent a scam”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scam baiter
des:
Ask for Scam Types, How to prevent Scams, and what to do if you are Scammed.

Scam Baiter educates you on different types of scams and is guaranteed to keep you sharp and make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Scam Baiter" or "Alexa, open Scam Baiter" to get to know about different scam types".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
